full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English/Vietnam Rev. 6-82) 2 18. Personal description (Tuong mao) : 19. Marks of identification Dau-tich lang (a) Color of hair (mau toc) BLACK (b) Color of eyes (mau mat) BLACK (c) Height (cao) 1.m.56 feet (bo) inches (dot) 20. Purpose in going to the United States Muc dich di Hoa-Ky (d) Complexion M.E.D. FA-RE 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? [Dinh lai bao lau? (Neu luon, xin ghi R3)] 22.-23. (Da có vé di ti noi cuoi cung chua) NOT YES PERM 24. Personal financial resources Tai san rieng (a) Cash Tien mat (c) Real estate (value) [Nha dat (trj-gia)] (b) Bank deposits Tien Ky-thac ngan-hang) (d) Other describe) [Täi-san Khac (mo tà)] 25. Father's name, address, date and place of birth (if deceased, so state giving year of death) [Ten cha, a-chi, noi sinh, ngay sin (Xin ghi ro nam chêt, neu da qua doi)] CAO VAN BAN , DEC 26. Mother's maiden name, address, date and place of birth (if deceased, so state giving year of death) [Ten nhu-danh cua me, dia-chi, noi sinh ngay sinh (xin ghi ro nam chet neu da qua doi)] DANG THI NHAN, DEC 27. Name, address, and relationship of next of kin in home country (if neither parent is living) [Ten va dia chi cua than-thuoc gan nhat tai nguyen-xu (neu ca cha lan me deu da qua doi)] 28. List all places of residence for 6 months or more since your 16th birthday City or town Provice Country Date (From-To) Calling or occupation (Thanh-phô hay thj-xa) (Tinh) (X) (Td'ngay can ngay) (Tungay-deh ngay) SGN VN YOUNG TILL NOW 29. List all organizations you are now or have been a member of or affiliated with since your 16th birthday (Include professional, vocational, social, and political organizations) Name and address Dates(From-To) Type of membership and office held, if any (Ten và dia-chi) (Tu ngay-den ngay) (Loai hoi-vien, chvc-vu neu co) NONE 30. List all languages, including your own, that you can speak, read, and write (Ke Khai moi sinh ngu, ca tieng me de, ma duong don nói, doc, va viet duoc) Language Speak Read Write (Sinh-Ngu) (nói) (Doc) (Viet) in x 31. Inclusive dates of previous residence in or visits to the United States (Give type of visa or status) (If never, so state) Yes No [Ghi ngay den toi ngay di nhung lan truoc day duong don cu-ngu hay qua Hoa-Ky chi (Cho biet loai chieu-khan I (Có) (Khong) hay qui-chê nhap-canh)] 32. Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution, or elsewhere for a mental disorder, drug addiction, or Yes No alcoholism? (If answer is Yes, explain) [Co bao gio duong-do duoc dua vao benh-vien hay co-quan não I (Co) (Khong) -tri vi`bi loan tri, nghien ma-tuy, hay nghien ruou Khong? (Neu CO xin giai-thich)] 33. Have you ever been arrested, convicted, or confined in a prison, or have you ever been placed in a poorhouse Yes No or other charitable institution? (If answer is Yes, explain) (Có) I (Khong) [Có bao gio duong ₫on bi bat giu, Kei an, bo tu, dudc dua vao nha te-ban hay mot co-quan tufthien nao Khac Khong? 34. Have you ever been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency, or Yes No similar action? (If answer is Yes, explain) I__ (Co) I_l 1 (Khong) [Co bao gi3 duong don dude huong ân-xá, dai xa, phuc-hoi, Khoan-hong, hay mot an-hue tuong-tu Khong?
